attributes.action: Stop media spread negativity about Brexit.
attributes.background: British public has made a decision on 23 June 2016 to leave European Union and main-stream media channels such as BBC ITV and Sky news broadcast programmes where it gave impression that British Public make mistake We need these type of stories to stop. The voice of British People should be Respected

rejection.details:
This would be the responsibility of the media companies themselves and not the UK Government or Parliament.

In any case we could not accept your petition because you have not given your full name.
